jobDescription.0: Created and managed the Community team's Product Vision through team presentations and roadmaps.

Built sustainable and scalable processes at a global scale for Techstars Community team.

Managed global NPS survey process for 1k+ Techstars Startup Weekend events.
Managed 200+ events during a global initiative called 'Global Startup Weekend' through one-on-one customer support and coordination of 12 mentors throughout 4 different time zones.
First Operations Coordinator for UP Global.
Supprted 120+ events in Latin America and 300+ Community Leaders in the region.
